author: Katherine Dunn
title: Uncertainty Over Fed Direction, Asian Markets Causes Gold to Surge - WSJ
text:
LONDONâ€”Gold prices surged past 3 1/2-month highs Wednesday morning as investors further discounted the possibility of a rate increase by the U.S. Federal Reserve this year and the precious metal benefited from Chinese investors fleeing stock-market falls in Asia.
